body.name: Maxfree S2 Triple Monitor for Laptop, 14'' Laptop Monitor Extender Plug & Play, 1080P HD Portable Laptop Screen Extender for 13-17'' Laptops, Compatible with Windows/Mac/Surface/Android/Switch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 13 mins
features: Increase Efficiency Up to 300% and Save Time - Maxfree travel monitor for laptop allows you to effortlessly open multiple windows simultaneously, enabling seamless multitasking. Experience a remarkable increase in efficiency, making it perfect for those who work remotely, IT professionals, stock traders, programmers, and anyone on the go. PS: If your laptop does not have a full-featured Type-C port, an external docking station is required, If assistance is needed, please contact us.

Ultra High Performance Screen - This 14" dual monitor features a stunning 1080P FHD IPS panel that brings your content to life with vibrant colors, sharp details, and a wide viewing angle. With a brightness of 300 nits, a resolution of 1920*1080P, and a 1:1000 contrast ratio, every image on the screen is rendered with exceptional clarity and depth.

Plug & Play Without Driver - Portable dual monitor for laptops offers a hassle-free experience with its plug & play functionality. Included in the package are all the necessary cables. Simply connect the Maxfree S2 travel monitor to your laptop using either the Type-C or HDMI + USB-A cables without the need for any additional driver downloads. Please Note: when use the HDMI cable, please connect one extra USB-A to USB-C cable to the same screen extender to power supply.

Wide Compatibility - The portable monitor's laptop extension feature is compatible with a wide range of devices and operating systems, including Intel, AMD, ARM, Android, Windows, Mac, M1 Pro, M2 Pro, Chrome, Linux, Type-C phones, PS4, Xbox, Switch, and other processors. PS: If your laptop uses an M1/M2/M3 chip, it needs to be used in conjunction with a docking station, Please contact us for further assistance.

Reliable Service - Please watch our promotional video for detailed instructions on how to connect. If you encounter a "No Signal" message or one of the screens is not work, kindly provide a detailed description of your issue and contact our after-sales customer service, they will promptly and perfectly resolve your problem. If you need an extra data cable or need to replace the product, please contact us, we will be happy to send you a new data cable free of charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and missed the external displays of my home office. I found this product and gave it a shot.My work laptop has USB-C ports and an HDMI port. I was able to get the displays up and running with ease. No delays/buffering issues, etc.My personal laptop does not have USB-C, so I knew using the extended displays would be a challenge. With the provided cords, getting one of the two extended displays wasn’t a problem. Needing the USB-C was clear, but there’s I figured there was no harm in finding out if there was a workaround.I emailed the company and got an immediate response. After a few emails back and forth (because of me), they helped me get this to work on my personal laptop without USB-C ports. I am really impressed at their customer service.The display is great quality and is easily transportable. I’m glad I found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product - ask for help if having issues connecting.
reviews.reviewText: I had trouble getting the third screen to work. So I emailed Maxfree Support and they responded. I sent them pictures and they figured out my cables were not connected properly. Because I didn't have an HDMI port on my computer I also had to purchase a USB adapter. That did it!!The only other issue is if I don't use my headset the sound goes to the Maxfree speakers on the monitor and it is not as good as the computer speakers.I rated it 4 stars because it is not easy to connect and the sound Otherwise, I LOVE this product!!! I also love the help I received. The tech was courteous and thorough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unparalleled customer service
reviews.reviewText: I received this and realized my computer did not have enough ports. Their customer service troubleshooting was so helpful and in depth. At one point, I realized that for my specific setup, I needed a duplicate cord from them (their specific HDMI to USBC is proprietary or something) as they only send one.The customer service rep LISTENED to me and TOOK ME AT MY WORD. Trusting my competence, they rush shipped a cord all the way from China, arriving only in a few days. They sent the confirmation and tracking number. As you can see in the picture, it worked!! Also, as you can see my setup is fairly simple. They have a customer for life.Downside: hdmi to usbc is a special cord you can't buy anywhereUpside: they were willing to make it right, no matter what

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Power Hungry and Proprietary
reviews.reviewText: It's great when it works! The displays are nice and a good size.But that's about it. It ONLY works with the supplied cables. I tried other known working cables and nothing else works. It will cycle on and say no signal then turn back off. So if the cables get damaged or lost your left with a $250 paper weight.Only way it will function is HDMI/USB-C or USB-C/USB-C. So if your usb-c can't supply enough power for these they will constantly cycle on and off. Using the supplied power cords will take up yet another slot and still will cause cycling if not enough power is being pushed to the screen.Overall:Nice concept but terrible implementation. WHY!!! Does anyone make proprietary hardware anymore? Customers should be able to just purchase another cable of any brand and use the product. Frankly making customers require coming back to you for a cable is really dirty business.If/when it works it's great but unless you have a very new laptop chances are this is going to be a headache and you may end up having to plug it into phone chargers to supply these with enough power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the Traveling Exec or Techie
reviews.reviewText: I work remotely so I am constantly on the go. In the past I would travel with 2 24" monitors to have multiple screen capabilities. Only problem was when I flew I had to purchase 2 monitors locally, then return the monitors I needed to the tech store. I purchased two of these units and am extremely satisfied. The items came with traveling cases, instructions and the cables. My laptops only provide video via the HDMI outputs consequently I needed 2 additional cables. I emailed the manufacturer and requested 4 additional cables. They were sent to me immediately free of charge. I now travel with no encumbrances with my equipment relative to traveling by ground or air. I highly recommend this product and would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Definitely not plug and play
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t told that I needed certain things on my laptop in order to get both screens working. Both screams do work but not together. After emailing the manufacturer who just happens to be in mainland China, several times, several back and forth it was determined that my USBC port is not a full function port and I would now need extra hardware in order to get it to work. So I ordered a usb-c to HDMI hub which should allow note screens to work( which it does) however they still do not work at the same time due to the fact that the system only comes with 1 HDMI to USB-c cable. I am unable to use an aftermarket cable as the one for this system is proprietary and I have to wait on one to be shipped all the way from CHINA. I have had this product for 2 weeks and I am STILL unsure if it will even work as needed. BTW the part is supposedly on the way, according to potential delivery dates I may be waiting another 2 months for delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavier item than anticipated
reviews.reviewText: This product is simple to hang up. Kind of an inconvenience that you have to have two ports for the two separate monitors. This product is HEAVY, it weighs way more than you think. I've had to take it on business trips with me and you can definitely tell when it is in your bag. It is easy to clip onto your laptop, but again you need a very heavy-duty laptop to handle the overall weight of monitors. It has great quality and brightness on each screen. The screens are stiff once you place them on your monitor-you can't adjust them different directions at all. Overall a decent product, but definitely not worth the price.

The media could not be loaded. The screens were a lot higher quality than the ones in the plastic frames. It is thinner & sharper. Sturdy metal construction to go with your equally high-quality laptop. The laptop lid is very secure and easy to use. It has made a positive difference in my productivity and being able to complete work more efficiently. I have used it for work, watching movies, and even gaming, and it has not let me down. It's also been great for live streaming so I can have my streaming software open on one window and the programs I need to bring into the stream on the others. Cannot recommend high enough. The screens themselves are a standout feature. They are bright, clear, and offer a high-quality visual experience, enhancing my productivity on the go

reviews.reviewTitle: Problems out of the box but customer service was still excellent.
reviews.reviewText: Well.. Was super excited.Opened the Box. Super Slick packaging.Lovin the STeel and design..Then.. ofcourse.. DUD.No visuals on display. Doesn't work. I get audio out of the portable monitor but no video.And of course Customer Service can't help. I'll try calling again tomorrow. Maybe I can change this review later.(Update after Maxfree customer Service reached out and were VERY GOOD)Wow. Kay. So I'm now fully impressed. After my review went online and my issues with contacting cust. svc they reached out personally regarding my F1 Product. We went back and forth to troubleshoot. All the while the first thing promised was if we weren't able to fix the problem they would offer a full refund. They even offered a 50% refund if they COULD get it working for the initial inconvenience. This is truly representative of Maxfree caring about it's customers. I'd like to thank them for reaching out and it seems that my experience with the hardware makes me very much an outlier. Looks like the majority of customers have great hardware so chalk this up to bad luck.Basically the product was a 1* (cause it didn't work) but the Customer service was a 5/5*. Andy was incredible. I averaged that to 3*.As I'm still in the market for a portable screen and will look at maxfree again for sure based on the customer service alone!So they did fully refund me and didn't force me to return the F1 screen. I'm gonna keep on working with Maxfree to see I can get it working properly anyways but the refund goes a long way to my customer satisfaction.Feel free to buy Maxfree knowing that if you're just an unlucky customer like me they'll be willing to work with you to keep you happy.Great Post-Purchase experience.
What is great about this product it doesn’t attach to the laptop.
I find it clunky and while it does make my work easier to do with having the second screen, it looks archaic. In hindsight I would have gone with the more expensive screen.

Product stopped working after 2.5 months. Have been trying to contact amazon to get a refund or even an exchange and can't get information from them regarding this. Was hoping Maxfree would be willing to help with product and warranty it as it is very new. Disappointed we spend $300 for a screen that stopped working so quickly.
